SELECT T.PALLET_NO, T.PALLET_NO PALLET_NAME, CASE WHEN T1.MATER_NO IS NOT NULL THEN T1.MATER_NO WHEN T1.MATER_NO IS NULL AND T.LOAD_STATUS = 0 THEN '空工装' ELSE '绑定异常' END MATER_NO FROM PSB_PALLET T LEFT JOIN PSB_PRODUCT T1 ON T1.PRODUCT_GUID = T.PRODUCT_GUID WHERE T.DELETE_FLAG = 0
t.PALLET_NO like '%'+ #where.PALLET_NO#+'%'
ORDER BY T.PALLET_NO
